subject: p16855430
Findings: A left lower lobe opacity demonstrating multiple air bronchograms is concerning for consolidation. There is no pneumothorax. There is a small left pleural effusion. The heart is moderately enlarged, as seen on the examination.
Impression: Left lower lobe pneumonia. Moderate cardiomegaly, without overt edema.
